parameters.name: Program Change
parameters.description: Select H90 Program (0-99)

parameters.name: Preset Mix
parameters.description: Overall wet/dry mix for the program

parameters.name: Bypass
parameters.description: Program bypass (0-63=bypass, 64-127=active)

parameters.name: Tap Tempo
parameters.description: Tap tempo input (send 127 to tap)

parameters.name: Algorithm A Select
parameters.description: Select algorithm for slot A. Categories: Delay(0-12), Distortion(13-17), EQ(18), Harmonizer(19-33), Looper(34), Modulation(35-47), Multi(48), Reverb(49-62), Synth(63-65), Utility(66-67)

parameters.name: Algorithm A Mix
parameters.description: Mix level for Algorithm A

parameters.name: Algorithm A Bypass
parameters.description: Algorithm A bypass (0-63=bypass, 64-127=active)

parameters.name: Algorithm A Param 1
parameters.description: First parameter for Algorithm A (function depends on selected algorithm)

parameters.name: Algorithm A Param 2
parameters.description: Second parameter for Algorithm A (function depends on selected algorithm)

parameters.name: Algorithm A Param 3
parameters.description: Third parameter for Algorithm A (function depends on selected algorithm)

parameters.name: Algorithm A Param 4
parameters.description: Fourth parameter for Algorithm A (function depends on selected algorithm)

parameters.name: Algorithm A Param 5
parameters.description: Fifth parameter for Algorithm A (function depends on selected algorithm)

parameters.name: Algorithm B Select
parameters.description: Select algorithm for slot B. Categories: Delay(0-12), Distortion(13-17), EQ(18), Harmonizer(19-33), Looper(34), Modulation(35-47), Multi(48), Reverb(49-62), Synth(63-65), Utility(66-67)

parameters.name: Algorithm B Mix
parameters.description: Mix level for Algorithm B

parameters.name: Algorithm B Bypass
parameters.description: Algorithm B bypass (0-63=bypass, 64-127=active)

parameters.name: Algorithm B Param 1
parameters.description: First parameter for Algorithm B (function depends on selected algorithm)

parameters.name: Algorithm B Param 2
parameters.description: Second parameter for Algorithm B (function depends on selected algorithm)

parameters.name: Algorithm B Param 3
parameters.description: Third parameter for Algorithm B (function depends on selected algorithm)

parameters.name: Algorithm B Param 4
parameters.description: Fourth parameter for Algorithm B (function depends on selected algorithm)

parameters.name: Algorithm B Param 5
parameters.description: Fifth parameter for Algorithm B (function depends on selected algorithm)

parameters.name: Routing Mode
parameters.description: Signal routing: 0-31=Series A→B, 32-63=Series B→A, 64-95=Parallel, 96-127=Series with crossfade

parameters.name: Expression Pedal
parameters.description: Expression pedal input (mappable to various parameters)

parameters.name: HotSwitch 1
parameters.description: HotSwitch 1 (programmable switch for performance control)

parameters.name: HotSwitch 2
parameters.description: HotSwitch 2 (programmable switch for performance control)

parameters.name: HotSwitch 3
parameters.description: HotSwitch 3 (programmable switch for performance control)

parameters.name: Kill Dry
parameters.description: Kill dry signal (0-63=dry on, 64-127=dry off - wet only)

description: Eventide H90 Harmonizer - Dual-algorithm harmonizer with 70+ algorithms across 9 categories. Supports complex routing (series, parallel), real-time algorithm switching, and expression pedal control. Features legendary Eventide pitch shifting, delays, reverbs, modulation, and unique multi-effects. Each program runs two algorithms simultaneously with independent parameter control. Algorithm Categories: Delay (23 algorithms), Distortion (1 algorithms), EQ (0 algorithms), Harmonizer (19 algorithms), Looper (0 algorithms), Modulation (5 algorithms), Multi (0 algorithms), Reverb (1 algorithms), Synth (1 algorithms), Utility (0 algorithms)
